long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically sync emails from Gmail to your Exsalerate account so everyone has access to the latest correspondence with your leads and customers. 

You can also schedule your next activity to followup on your email from gmail which is added to your to-do list in Exsalerate. 

You'll need an Exsalerate account to use this extension, sign up for a free 14 day trial www.exsalerate.com
